card.title: Description
card.content:
With this functionality you can ...
- create a "simple" rendered image.

guide.title: Create a simple image of a certain view point

steps.step: Select a protein from the tree.
Click on :google_material-open_in_new_w200:, to load the pymol session of the selected protein.
Enter a filename for the image.
Wait for the rendering process to finish before using PyMOL.

details.item: A simple image renders faster than ray-traced images but has lower quality.
